talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Royal Guard$
Please use the [Warp] at Royal Guards in various parts of the town.
Warp allows you to travel more quickly within the town.

$Royal Guard$
Welcome to Saint Haven.
Can I help you?

$Royal Guard$
I've heard rumours about you, {user_nick}.
You talk to yourself on the guards' tent and are slave to the Red Hood who's sworn brothers with the orc.

$Royal Guard$
Recently a friend returned from training at the Mana Ridge. It was so cold, his facial muscles were damaged by the frost.
So much for my advice to wear appropriate warm clothings. He was going on and on about a man's pride... hah, now look at him! Tsk...

$Royal Guard$
My girlfriend left me a few days ago. Apparently she doesn't like my constant army stories. Those stories are so spectacular, how can anyone hate it?

$Royal Guard$
Harori's [I Love Cake ?] concert date clashes with my duty! Argh!
I want to go so bad... Maybe I should abandon my post...

$Royal Guard$
429 Days 7 Hours 27 minutes 32 seconds... 429 Days 7 Hours 27 minutes 33 seconds...
429 Days 7 Hours 27 Minutes 34 seconds... 429 Days 7 Hours 27 MInutes 35 Seconds...
Whew... I guess I just have to wait 37,092,456 more seconds before I can go home.

$Royal Guard$
Use the [Warp] to teleport quickly around town.
